original_title: Entre el relámpago y el trueno
overview: Interlude. Space between frames. During the last year I was accompanying Anacos on his tour of festivals. When finishing and inventory: a few videos without a clear purpose and several photos of windows. About the time between work and work. About the search for the idea. On the fear that it is not the ideal. I hope that the piece serves to remove that fear.
title: Entre el relámpago y el trueno
